text_block_list.text: I believed that coming to Tracen Academy would change my world――
After a fateful encounter with an exceptional Uma Musume, enjoying those halycon days. However, even after coming here, the days remained colorless.
I still wasn't reponsible for anyone, but I wasn't sure what to look for when scouting. I sighed, wondering if the dull days would continue.
It was during that time that I happened to see a certain Uma Musume on the training course. She hadn't debuted yet, but something caught my eye.
Haa…… Haa…… Ahaa☆ Ahahaa★
Ahahahahaa, Mar~vel~~ous☆★☆
Cheerfully laughing while running, I was captivated. She seemed to be delighted, having fun while she was running. That Uma Musume――
Suddenly, in the middle of the course she collapsed and layed sprawled out!
Zeh……Aha ……Hahaa ……zeh, Haa…… Ahahaha, haa.
Haa…… Ahaha…… Yeah☆ I'm just Marvelous★ Ahahaa☆
I was worried she had overexerted herself, but this Uma Musume was still laughing while out of breath. ……It was a little unnerving.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh geez~, you did it again, are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Can't you do something about that habit of yours of running 'til you drop? It's dangerous to fall on the course, don't you think?
But you see, Nature, today…… it felt like ――Haa ……it'd be especially Marvelous!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah. I figured you'd say that but, if you keep collapsing like that, it'll make everyone else worry!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh? ……Ah~, were you observing, Trainer-san? I guess it would be surprising if she suddenly fell~, but it's something that happens all the time!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: This girl―― her name's Marvelous Sunday but, I guess you could say she's the type that doesn't know her own limits and just runs frantically?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: She never puts on the brakes, so she ends up moving until she runs out of energy. She's like a little kid and ends up falling asleep mid-meal.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Anyways, it's not like she's sick or injured so there's no need to worry! I'm sure she'll be able to move after she rests for a bit!
Because it was such a memorable encounter, now, everytime I see a red ribbon, I can't help but follow it with my eyes. When I do――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ahahahahaa, Ahahaa☆ The wax is so slippery~, the hallway's so shiny, Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Geez, you're really energetic today too~. Make sure it's safe before you start running, okay?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Okaaa~y☆ Ahahaa~, slide slide~, Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Mystery tea!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Mystery tea! ――gulp…… gulp……puhaa!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaa, it's not good at all~!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, you're right, it's not tasty at all☆ So mysterious and so yucky, but still very Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ahahahahaa, my arms feel like putty! My legs are shaking! I can't move~, Ma-rvelous☆★☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Muscle soreness is Marvelous☆ Tomorrow will be more~ Marvelous★ Ow ow ow oww, Ahahahahaa☆
The word 『Marvelous』 repeatedly came out of Marvelous Sunday's mouth. After hearing it so many times, I was starting to have my doubts.
I can't even tell if it's something happy, painful, good, or bad. But, whenever she said 『Marvelous』, her expression seemed cheerful.
Maybe for her, the word had a different meaning than the one in the dictionary. I realized that I wanted to know what that meaning was.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: C'mon~~, just when I felt like training today! I hate the rain, Maya's bored!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: But Mayano, the rain is really~ Marvelous, you know?☆ Especially when it's raining hard like this, it's even more Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Eh~, how? If it's raining this hard, we might not be able to train tomorrow either, you know? Maya wants to run!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: That's true, if you can't run because it's raining, it's boring, huh?☆ But if you wait, and wait, and wait a little more for the sun then――
Then…… what? Maybe now I'll finally figure out what she means by marvelous. That's what I thought while lisenting closely, but――

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ahh, Maya's got it! You're right, I guess if you think about that then the rain might just be marvelous♪

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Right!? Ahahaa, rain, rain falling Marvelous~☆ Splish splash, splish splash Marve~lous★

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Marve~lous☆

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Ahahahahaa, let's go!
My shoulders dropped because I didn't get my answer. Once again, today I was still unable to figure out what 『Marvelous』 meant.
